entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 14. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
